name: CATARACT_PLANNING_INFO
description: This table contains cataract surgery information about the status of the surgery.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: OPH_SURG_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the status of the surgery

columns.name: OPH_SURG_LINK_ID
columns.description: Link to the case for the ophthalmology surgery

columns.name: OPH_SURG_HX_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date of the surgery if done historically and not linked to a case.

columns.name: OPH_SURG_HX_SURGEON
columns.description: Stores the surgeon name for a historical surgery not linked to a case.

columns.name: OPH_SURG_HX_LOC
columns.description: Stores the description of the location where a surgery was performed if done historically and not linked to a case.
